pageTitle: Nicholls State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {157262=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 108604=Nicholls not only offers cafeteria food, but a union full of other choices. Some of those choices would be a salad bar, sandwich shop(kind of like Subway), pizza place, Jazz-mans(coffee shop) and even Colonel Retreat(offer wings, burgers, and beer). Prices are a downside, all on campus residents have to buy a meal plan. If you stay in the dorms you can end up spending over 1400 on a meal plan alone. If you live in the apartments though you have an option of $500 declining balance.}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I LOVE being at Nicholls. I am super-glad I chose Nicholls State University to further my education because the environment is wonderful. There are beautiful grounds to enjoy, quiet places to focus & study, & many friendly faces to help you out. Am learning a lot The teachers are very friendly & willing to go out of their way to help you to the best of their ability. If you're having trouble with anything all you have to do is ask. The material covered in the classes are interesting & challenging. Login to rate or flag the reviews Sayer from Hammond, LA 05/30/2009 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has been to campus. 9 out of 12 people found this review useful. 2 of 37 Categories Comments Great for these types of students great for LD students Login to rate or flag the reviews
